channel.title: Combat Help?
channel.description: Hey guys my delta server needs a bit of work. Some people are complaining to me that when thy click an npc they hit once and then stop attacking. I was just wondering if you guys had a fix for that? Thanks

item.title: Combat Help?
item.dc:creator: @xDizzay xDizzay
item.description:
@xDizzay wrote:

Can’t find it. Got a code?
P.S. I can’t post anything so i have to edit. Says i can’t double post wtf?

Read full topic

item.title: Combat Help?
item.dc:creator: @Ddragonimp Ddragonimp
item.description:
@Ddragonimp wrote:

Either A. your combat attack speed is REAALY Slow.
or B. you have a line of code some where telling you to exit combat or resetAttack();

Look for both.

and does it happen for autocasting, bows, and melee.

Read full topic
